text: Miho Komatsu is a Japanese singer-songwriter, record producer and lyricist has recorded eight studio albums, twenty six singles, and three compilation album for a span of 9 years (1997–2006). == Studio albums == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |+ List of studio albums, with selected chart positions |- !
